## GridOptions interface

Describes grid options used for grid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GridOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoInitialize](./grid.gridoptions.autoinitialize.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether grid should be initialized automaticaly during 'NgOnInit' phase |
|  [cssClasses](./grid.gridoptions.cssclasses.md) | <code>{}</code> | Css classes applied to grid component, possible to override only part of classes |
|  [pagingPosition](./grid.gridoptions.pagingposition.md) | <code>PagingPosition</code> | Position of paging rendered by grid |
|  [plugins](./grid.gridoptions.plugins.md) | <code>GridPluginTypes</code> | Object defining overrides for default plugins, default plugins can be also specified using DI |
